page.title: 13SW BASINGSTOKE: FAMILIES 1
page.content: Most of the families in our area have a mum, dad and two or three children. They usually own a car and often visit relations at weekends.Most people have few relatives close by. Usually the father goes to work and now many mothers are working when children are at school, or work nights. The children often do things on their own or with friends in their spare time: watching T.V. is popular, and playing out on bikes is too.In the evenings some children belong to Cubs or Brownies or sports clubs. One hobby is collecting things; stamps,flowers, toy cars, stickers, rubbers. Children enjoy sweets and some parents smoke cigarettes. Our 7 and 8 year old friends go to bed at 8pm and get up at 7am. Some parents go to the pub or the cinema or theatre in the evening while a babysitter looks after the children.
